CustomField.description: Default creativity/randomness setting for the LLM (typically 0.0 to 2.0). Lower values result in more deterministic and focused output, while higher values increase randomness and creativity.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Controls the randomness of the LLM's responses. Consult provider documentation for allowed range and default behavior if left blank (though a default is provided here).
CustomField.label: Default Temperature
